title: Constructivist-Based e-Learning Interaction Design: Language Learning Simulation

context.additional_context: Enhanced language interaction learning in limited-technology environments using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can perform language interactions reflecting cultural contexts with over 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Learners evaluate their ability to self-construct meaning of language expressions through constructivist problem-solving activities
Learners share language usage contexts three or more times and provide feedback through mobile platform-based collaborative activities with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
